metadata.title: CVE-2023-38572 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed in iOS15.7.8 and iPadOS 15.7.8, iOS 16.6 and iPadOS 16.6, tvOS 16.6, macOSVentura 13.5, Safari 16.6, watchOS 9.6. A website may be able to bypassSame Origin Policy.

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
wpewebkit package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
